suggest_remote_archive_that_was_moved_an._comment: Takes Source URL and constructs new URL using each replacement rule above
suggest_remote_archive_that_was_moved_an._comment_on_archive_name: Logic will replace <archive_basename> with actual archive basename
suggest_remote_archive_that_was_moved_an._comment_on_archive_extension: Logic will try all known archive extensions

suggest_remote_archive_from_another_subd._comment: Takes Source URL and constructs new URLs by replacing the subdomain
